thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 21 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-SailPoint Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.03

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-SailPoint Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.03
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - SailPoint Technologies Holdings Inc :
* SAILPOINT ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.17
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 53 PERCENT TO $67.8 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.04 TO $0.06
* SEES Q1 2018 NON-GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.03 TO $0.04
* SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $220 MILLION TO $224 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $44 MILLION TO $45 MILLION * SEES Q1 REVENUE IN RANGE OF $44 MILLION TO $45 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
